LanguageData.PRF_Settings_C_Lite_ToolTip: Toggle between PRF Lite and PRF Core. \nUnchecked means PRF Core \nChecked means PRF Lite
LanguageData.PRF_Settings_C_Patches_Reachability_CanR:
Toggels the Advanced IO CanReach Patch
When checked the Patch is active and allowes Pawns to reach DSU contents using Advanced IO Ports even if the Path to the DSU is blocked
Patch is not active by default as it may cause spikes and is only usefull in some cases.
(ProjectRimFactory.Common.HarmonyPatches.Patch_Reachability_CanReach:Prefix)
LanguageData.PRF_Settings_C_Patches_WealthWatcher_Cal:
Toggels the Cold Storage WealthWatcher Patch
When checked the Patch is active and items in Coldstorage contribute to Colony Wealth.
For most Players we reccomend this to be on.
Peformence load on this is ~1ms per 1k Things stored. This runs every 5k Ticks
(ProjectRimFactory.Common.HarmonyPatches.Patch_WealthWatcher_CalculateWealthItems:Postfix)
LanguageData.PRF.Common.ForbidOnPlacingDefaultDesc: Toggle this to forbid items on placement
